description:
I have played RuneScape since mid 2006 and watched how over the years it has evolved.

One of the most controversial changes in the Linux community has been the development of the NXT Client. Mostly because it was a challenge for many users to get on distros other than Ubuntu Trusty, the graphics are great if you have a good enough GPU. 

At the time of writing I have attained >99 in every skill, including 120 in Invention and Slayer. I have spent over a year of my life, in total, playing RS. That is how addictive it is.
summary: Favourite MMORPG, been playing it for over a decade

description: Love this game and play it regularly since 2007 - would highly recommend for every RPG fan out there. One of the best Linux-native games as well (no emulator running in the background == great performance)
summary: It's been more than a decade

description: Works great when Runescape's login servers are up to par
summary: Works great when Runescape's login servers are up to par

description: Probably my favorite game ever. Been playing for 15 years. Extremely chill with a ridiculous amount of content.
The icon is huge and does not look appealing at all.
